Body:
data = np.random.multivariate_normal([0, 0, 1], [[1, 0.5, 0.2], [0.5, 1, 
    0.3], [0.2, 0.3, 1.0]], size=1000000)
parameters = ['x', 'y', 'z']
c = ChainConsumer()
c.add_chain(data, parameters=parameters)
latex_table = c.analysis.get_correlation_table()
actual = """\\begin{table}
            \\centering
            \\caption{Parameter Correlations}
            \\label{tab:parameter_correlations}
            \\begin{tabular}{c|ccc}
                 & x & y & z\\\\
                \\hline
                   x  &  1.00 &  0.50 &  0.20 \\\\
                   y  &  0.50 &  1.00 &  0.30 \\\\
                   z  &  0.20 &  0.30 &  1.00 \\\\
                \\hline
            \\end{tabular}
        \\end{table}"""
assert latex_table.replace(' ', '') == actual.replace(' ', '')
